question.content:
$\begin{align} \qquad \dfrac{1}{2}x-\dfrac{1}{3}y&=\dfrac{15}{2} \\\\
3x-y&= 24 \end{align}$

According to the system of equations above, what is 
the value of $xy$?

[[☃ radio 1]]
